Flow.description: This PB is triggered when a Task is Created or Updated.

value.stringValue: NOT(ISNEW() ) && ISCHANGED([Task].IsClosed) && [Task].IsClosed = true && ISPICKVAL([Task].Type , 'MCR') && NOT(ISBLANK([Task].WhatId )) && BEGINS([Task].WhatId, "006")

formulas.name: formula_myRule_22
formulas.expression: NOT(ISNEW() ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.IsClosed}) && {!myVariable_current.IsClosed} = true && ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type} , 'MCR') && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.WhatId} )) && BEGINS({!myVariable_current.WhatId}, "006")
